column4: hey guys just popping in. I am trying to install ubuntu on a compaq persario 2500 (POS) and the window manager is going so slow I can't get the GUI installer to function.  The computer is not over loaded just sort of crawling for a unknow reason. is there a non-GUI installer I can use of the cd. Desktop version
sadly the desktop cd doesnt have the text-mode installer, you need the alterante cd for that
or maybe the resolution is "too big" for vesa driver, try the "compatible vga mode" or how its called
its running from cd, so its normal that its slow
